channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-11558] Fix dead links to doc of hadoop-tools
item.description: Some links to dosc of hadoop-tools are dead by HADOOP-10976.
item.summary: Fix dead links to doc of hadoop-tools

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I have checked the dead links in all hadoop-tools thanks to:
http://wummel.github.io/linkchecker/other.html

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12704630/HADOOP-11558.001.patch
against trunk revision bd0a9ba.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+0 tests included. The patch appears to be a documentation patch that doesn't require tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. There were no new javadoc warning messages.

+1 eclipse:eclipse. The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 13 new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-tools/hadoop-sls hadoop-tools/hadoop-streaming.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5944//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5944//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-sls.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5944//console

This message is automatically generated.
Committed this to trunk, branch-2, and branch-2.7. Thanks jpmat and iwasakims for your contributions!

HADOOP-11558. Fix dead links to doc of hadoop-tools. Contributed by Masatake Iwasaki. (ozawa: rev 7da136ecca4dafc83ef69b5d9980fa5b67ada084)

  • hadoop-tools/hadoop-sls/src/site/markdown/SchedulerLoadSimulator.md
  • hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/CHANGES.txt
  • hadoop-tools/hadoop-streaming/src/site/markdown/HadoopStreaming.md.vm
jpmat, We appreciate if you ping assignee of the issue and change the assignee to yourself before you take over the issue. Thanks!
